thread.section_title: Roma Resort Barberini - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Very clean and comfortable
thread.title_full: Very clean and comfortable - Review of Roma Resort Barberini, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: JTcanuck
title: Very clean and comfortable
text: My family group of 7 stayed here in July 2015 for 3 nights. Very clean and quiet, staff was quite friendly and helpful with us. We had forgotten passports at our base villa, but they were very helpful with that. They also gave us maps to help us around the city. Would recommend, and would stay here again.
